Spryker Jarvis Alpha

What is the mission of Spryker Jarvis?
To help you understand what is needed to keep your Spryker project up to date with our Product Releases.
To who Spryker Jarvis is useful?
Developer, IT Manager, Product Owner/Manager that wants to understand the migration path for their Spryker project.
⚠️ This tool is here to help you migrate your Spryker project, you are still responsible of your Spryker project when using Spryker Jarvis.

Product Releases

This section displays the next Spryker Product Releases available to your Spryker project.

Some Product Releases will require databases migrations or some changes to be done in your code or nothing at all.

Modules

This section displays the next majors available for the Spryker modules that you use inside your Spryker project.

Spryker features you currently do not use
